name: Cargo Commando
description:
Rules:

  • The commando is controlled using the arrow keys, and navigates a series of vertical and horizontal paths.
  • Security patrols pursue the commando utilizing the same paths that the commando can use.
    • If security catches the commando, the player loses and must start over.
    • The player can press the action button, or the x key, to temporarily stun adjacent security personnel.
  • The commando runs to the different cargo on the map, loosing them from their position so that they descend.
    • Cargo falls until it reaches a special platform, where it comes to a rest again.
    • If a cargo falls onto another cargo, that second cargo is loosed, and the former takes its place.
    • If cargo falls onto security personnel, that personnel is crushed and destroyed.
    • The player beats the level once they have commandeered all of the cargo, by loosing all of the cargo into trucks waiting to be loaded.
